library(tidyverse) 
library(showtext) 
library(ofce)

  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.pos="H", 
  out.extra="",
  dev="ragg_png",
  fig.showtext=TRUE,
  cache=FALSE)

showtext_auto()
